schemes.name: PMKSY â€“ Per Drop More Crop (Micro-Irrigation Subsidy)
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture & Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy assistance for installation of drip and sprinkler irrigation systems to improve water-use efficiency.
schemes.benefits: Reduced water consumption and lower cultivation cost with improved yields.
schemes.eligibility: All registered farmers growing eligible crops in notified districts.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Department of Horticulture or Raitha Samparka Kendra.

schemes.name: Drip Irrigation Subsidy for Horticulture Crops
schemes.department: Department of Horticulture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides financial subsidy for installation of drip irrigation systems for horticulture crops.
schemes.benefits: Efficient water delivery and improved crop productivity.
schemes.eligibility: Eligible horticulture farmers registered with the district department.

schemes.name: Sprinkler Irrigation Subsidy Scheme
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for installation of sprinkler irrigation systems in rainfed and dryland areas.
schemes.benefits: Improved irrigation coverage and crop resilience in dry regions.
schemes.eligibility: Priority to small and marginal farmers in dryland regions.

schemes.name: Irrigation Pipeline & Water Conveyance Subsidy
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Provides subsidy for purchase and installation of PVC irrigation pipelines for efficient water conveyance.
schemes.benefits: Reduced water loss and improved on-farm water distribution.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers with functional borewell or water source connections.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Raitha Samparka Kendra or District Agriculture Office.

schemes.name: Watershed Development & Farm Pond Assistance
schemes.department: Watershed Development Department, Government of Karnataka
schemes.description: Financial support for construction of farm ponds and water harvesting structures in drought-prone areas.
schemes.benefits: Improved groundwater recharge and water availability for crops.
schemes.eligibility: Farmers located in notified watershed development project areas.
schemes.how_to_apply: Apply through Watershed Development Department Office.
